languages.text: "Почему еретики тебя пленили, а не убили на месте?"
"Why did the heretics capture you instead of just killing you on the spot?"
languages.original_text: "Почему еретики тебя пленили, а не убили на месте?"

traits.locale_text: "Why did the heretics capture you instead of just killing you on the spot?"
"Why did the heretics capture you instead of just killing you on the spot?"
"Why did they capture you instead of just killing you on the spot?"
"Why did they capture you instead of just killing you on the spot?"
"Why did the heretics capture you instead of just killing you on the spot?"
"Why did the heretics capture you instead of just killing you on the spot?"

languages.text: 「なぜ異端者たちは、君をその場で殺さずに生け捕りにしたんだ？」
languages.original_text: "Why did the heretics capture you instead of just killing you on the spot?"

traits.locale_text: 「なぜあいつらは、君をその場で殺さずに生け捕りにしたんだ？」

languages.text: "Warum haben die Ketzer Euch gefangen genommen und nicht einfach sofort getötet?"
languages.original_text: "Why did the heretics capture you instead of just killing you on the spot?"

traits.locale_text: "Warum haben die Ketzer Euch gefangen genommen und nicht einfach sofort getötet?"

languages.text: « Pourquoi les hérétiques vous ont-ils capturé, au lieu de vous éliminer immédiatement ? »
languages.original_text: "Why did the heretics capture you instead of just killing you on the spot?"

traits.locale_text: « Pourquoi les hérétiques vous ont-ils capturé, au lieu de vous éliminer immédiatement ? »

languages.text: «¿Por qué los herejes lo capturaron en vez de matarlo allí mismo?».
languages.original_text: "Why did the heretics capture you instead of just killing you on the spot?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Por qué los herejes lo capturaron en vez de matarlo allí mismo?».

languages.text: “那些异端分子为什么要抓住你，没有当场把你杀掉？”
languages.original_text: "Why did the heretics capture you instead of just killing you on the spot?"

traits.locale_text: “那些异端分子为什么要抓住你，没有当场把你杀掉？”

languages.original_text: "Why did the heretics capture you instead of just killing you on the spot?"
